name: Shop Company Tycoon
description:
Build shops, buy products and sell them at a higher price and get rich. That's basically this game. You can also get marketing on your stores.

The game may not work fullscreen with many monitors.

Wikia: https://sct.fandom.com/

Report bugs on: https://sct.fandom.com/wiki/Talk:Bugs_and_Ideas

--- Update Log ---

16th June 2020, version 0.1:

- Game released. Added five cities to build shops and products. Marketing added.
